typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Make as string,
		Model as string,
		Type as string,
		Origin as string,
		DriveTrain as string,
		Length as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive({Date of manufature} = currentDate('GMT')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Make as string,
		Model as string,
		Type1 as string,
		Origin as string,
		DriveTrain as string,
		Length as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Make,
		Model,
		Type1 = Type,
		Origin,
		DriveTrain,
		Length
	)) ~> sink1
